workflowDescriptor.description: Exports DSS file for external use.

workflowDescriptor.name: ImportScalars
workflowDescriptor.description: Import the scalar time series from the Import directory and delete the files after importing

workflowDescriptor.name: ImportDatacard
workflowDescriptor.description: Import the scalar time series from the Import directory and delete the files after importing

workflowDescriptor.description: Import the gridded time series from the Import directory and delete the files after importing

workflowDescriptor.description: Run preprocessors and set time of last observed data

workflowDescriptor.description: Convert stage to discharge for Hawaii streams

workflowDescriptor.name: Climatology
workflowDescriptor.description: Calculated average daily temperature from historic MAT datacards

workflowDescriptor.name: MAP-MAT Processing
workflowDescriptor.description: Run MergeMAP and MergeMAT for each basin

workflowDescriptor.name: HRR_MAP-MAT Processing
workflowDescriptor.description: Run HRRR_MAP and HRRR_MAT for each basin

workflowDescriptor.name: NAMNEST Processing
workflowDescriptor.description: Run NAMNEST and NAMNEST for each basin

workflowDescriptor.name: DPA-QPE Processing
workflowDescriptor.description: Run DPA Processing for a gage location

workflowDescriptor.description: Run OnehrMergeMAP and OnehrMergeMAT for each basin

workflowDescriptor.description: Calculate percent of normal SWE for each catchment

workflowDescriptor.description: Calculate average SWE for each catchment from NOHRSC grid

workflowDescriptor.name: NOHRSC_historical_SWE_Calculations
workflowDescriptor.description: Calculate average SWE for each catchment from historical NOHRSC grid

workflowDescriptor.name: StageFlowDiff
workflowDescriptor.description: Run SSTG-STGE and SQIN-QINE for each gage

workflowDescriptor.name: ExportSHEF_MAPX_MATX
workflowDescriptor.description: Export MAP-MAPX, MAT-MATX, MAT-MATX_MPE, MAPX, MATX and MATX_MPE to SHEF for each basin

workflowDescriptor.name: ExportSHEF_SWE_NOHRSC
workflowDescriptor.description: Export SWE data to SHEF to compare NOHRSC and SNOW-17 models

workflowDescriptor.description: Export STGE data to SHEF for QPF ensemble runs

workflowDescriptor.description: Exports the SWE Forcings daily to archive model snow states

workflowDescriptor.name: Export SWE Forcings to PIXML from calibration run
workflowDescriptor.description: Exports the SWE Forcings from a calibration run, for use in the PCA Snow Update

workflowDescriptor.description: Convert Q (flow) to Percentage of Bankfull flow (QINE/QactionStage)
